1.16.5.1.16.5-1.2.2: Initial 1.16.5(/4) release on original CurseForge page.
1.16.5.1.16.5-1.2.1:
Small release fixing dedicated server crash and doing some *very minor* performance improvements (don’t get too excited, you probably won’t even notice it).

Changes:
- Fixed crash when loading on dedicated server, chunk animator is now just ignored.
- Very minor performance improvements.
